document.full_text: attorneys for olympic track star carl lewis, who is aiming to run for new jersey state senate, battled on wednesday to get him reinstated on a june 7 primary election ballot.
document.title: carl lewis files appeals to get on new jersey ballot
lines_and_colors: attorneys for olympic track star carl lewis, who is aiming to run for new jersey state senate, battled on wednesday to get him reinstated on a june 7 primary election ballot.
